syslog-ng-pe-guide-admin.title: Administration Guide
syslog-ng-pe-guide-admin.description: This manual is the primary documentation of the syslog-ng Premium Edition application

syslog-ng-pe-guide-whatsnew.title: Release Notes
syslog-ng-pe-guide-whatsnew.description: Learn more about the news and highlights of syslog-ng Premium Edition version 7

syslog-ng-pe-guide-quickstart.title: Quick Start Guide
syslog-ng-pe-guide-quickstart.description: A short tutorial to get you up and running with the most common scenarios for syslog-ng Premium Edition

syslog-ng-tutorial-mutual-auth-tls.title: Mutual authentication using TLS
syslog-ng-tutorial-mutual-auth-tls.description: This tutorial shows you step-by-step how to create the certificates required to authenticate your server and your clients, and how to configure syslog-ng Premium Edition (syslog-ng PE) to send your log messages in an encrypted connection

syslog-ng-tutorial-udp-source.title: Collecting log messages from UDP sources
syslog-ng-tutorial-udp-source.description: Tips and tricks to receive the most log messages when you have to use the UDP transport protocol

syslog-ng-pe-v7.0-performance-whitepaper.title: Performance Guideline for syslog-ng Premium Edition
syslog-ng-pe-v7.0-performance-whitepaper.description: This document summarizes the findings of performance tests and measurements of the syslog-ng Premium Edition application

syslog-ng-pe-wec-guide.title: Windows Event Collector Administration Guide
syslog-ng-pe-wec-guide.description: This manual is the primary documentation of the Windows Event Collector tool, used for forwarding Windows events to syslog-ng Premium Edition 7.
